transcript:
Hello?
Hanji.
Han sir, mai Riya bol rahi hu IndiaMART head office se. Actually, jo aapne mujhe do mail ID share ki thi salese@shreenathtradingcompany.com ek ye aap login nahi kar pa rahe hain, dusra purchase shreenath@shreenathtradingcompany.com, right?
Main main main aapko batata hu.
Han han mujhe confirm kar dijiye, mai wo dono mail ID cross checking wapas kara rahi hu.
Us din to aapne mujhe yahi dono mail ID bheji thi.
Do ID to login ho gayi hai meri, jo ki director@ aur sales@. Ab ek ID hai purchase@shreenathtrading.com aur dusri hai info@.
@shreenath.
Okay, sir, ek second aap mujhe bataiye yaha pe jo aapne mujhe purchase wali puri jo aapne mujhe copy karke bheja wo aapne purchase shreenath@shreenathtradingcompany.com bola hai, to exact kya hai uska mail ID?
Main aapko WhatsApp karta hu.
Han, please aap wo dono mujhe WhatsApp kar dijiye, dono mail ID.
Han.
Okay, okay sir, okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Unable to login to two mail IDs.

- Wants to confirm the correct email IDs.



Resolution:

- Customer will share the correct email IDs on WhatsApp.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- email id, login issue, verification
